title: AS400 Modernization for Global Logistics
summary: Transformed a legacy AS400 system into a modern, cloud-native application landscape, improving operational efficiency by 40%.
content: Our client, a global logistics leader, was struggling with a mission-critical but aging AS400 system. We implemented a strategic modernized roadmap, decoupling core logic into scalable microservices while maintaining the reliability of the underlying data. The result was a future-ready platform that supports real-time tracking and advanced analytics.

title: Next-Gen Mobile App for Retail Leader
summary: Built a high-performance cross-platform mobile application using Flutter, resulting in a 25% increase in mobile-driven sales.
content: For this top-tier retailer, we developed a seamless mobile experience that integrates with their existing ERP. Leveraging Flutter for cross-platform efficiency and Next.js for a robust backend, we delivered a secure, scalable solution that provides personalized shopping experiences and real-time inventory management.

title: AI-Driven Analytics for Healthcare Provider
summary: Implemented a predictive analytics platform using Machine Learning to optimize patient flow and resource allocation.
content: HealthFirst Systems needed a way to predict patient surges and optimize staffing. We built a custom ML solution that analyzes historical data and real-time inputs, providing actionable insights that reduced wait times by 30% and improved patient outcomes through better resource management.
